duration_in_months: After the delivery is requested at the depot identified below.
full_summary:
# Aircraft Spare Part Procurement

## Notice ID
* Title: Aircraft Spare Part Procurement
* Reference Number: W8485-247877/A
* Solicitation Number: U7889-20489279

## Notice Details
* Publication Date: October 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: November 14, 2023
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence intends to procure aircraft spare parts as outlined below.

### Items
* Item 1: RR-188/AL Chaff (16,200 units)
	+ NSN: 5865-01-338-1200
	+ Part Number: 1050AS171 (NCAGE: 30003)
	+ Part Number: 10142157 (NCAGE: A486G)
	+ Part Number: 1370PLI846563 (NCAGE: 9009H)
* Item 2: RR-170-A/AL Chaff (16,200 units)
	+ NSN: 1370-01-037-8414
	+ Part Number: 133024-0001 (NCAGE: 48ZY0, A486G, 55180, K0282)
	+ Part Number: 00050 (NCAGE: K0282, K0330)
	+ Part Number: RR170AAL (NCAGE: 19397, 7L547, G1923)
	+ Part Number: 7729430 (NCAGE: 19397)

## Tender Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals in English or French to the following address:

* Contact Person: Steve Duval
* Email: [DAP5Contracting.DOA5Passationdecontrats@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DAP5Contracting.DOA5Passationdecontrats@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 292-9650
* Fax: None
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Tender Documents
The tender notice, RFP documents, and relevant specifications are available on the Canada Buys website at:
https://canad
